description: Claude Code Dev plugin hooks for feedback capture and notifications

hooks.prompt:
Analyze this session for Product Forge feedback. Identify:
1. Improvements to existing skills/commands/agents
2. New skill/command ideas
3. Bug reports
4. Reusable patterns

Respond JSON: {"ok": true, "feedback": [{"type": "improvement|skill-idea|command-idea|bug-report|pattern", "title": "...", "description": "...", "target": "plugin/component"}]} or {"ok": true, "feedback": []}
